keyMoments.description: Introduced as CP9's newest member who only knows four of the six Rokushiki powers
Killed by Rob Lucci for being inadequate - struck with Shigan and thrown into the ocean during Aqua Laguna

abilities.name: Soru
abilities.description: High-speed movement technique, though Nero's mastery was incomplete

reveals.description: Revealed to know only four of the six Rokushiki powers, making him inadequate by CP9 standards
Executed by Rob Lucci for failing to meet CP9's standards of mastering all six Rokushiki

keyMoments.description: Enters CP9 car with Robin after hiding under her cloak
Executes clever escape plan using Smoke Star to blind CP9
Successfully grabs Robin and escapes to detached train car
Tells Robin she needs Luffy's permission to leave and should have faith in him
Knocked unconscious by Robin's Ocho Fleur Clutch when she rejects the rescue

abilities.name: Smoke Star
abilities.description: A smoke bomb that creates a dense smokescreen to blind and confuse enemies

reveals.description: Debuts the Smoke Star technique - a tactical smoke bomb for creating diversions and escape opportunities
Demonstrates understanding of crew bonds, stating that a crew member cannot leave without the captain's agreement

relationships.description: Risks his life attempting to rescue Robin, showing his dedication despite her rejection
Demonstrates faith in Luffy as captain, telling Robin she should trust in him

keyMoments.description: Appears with Sogeking in the CP9 car
Temporarily rescued by Sogeking's smoke bomb plan
Shocked by Sogeking's words about having faith in Luffy
Knocks out Sogeking with Ocho Fleur Clutch, coldly rejecting the rescue attempt

abilities.name: Ocho Fleur Clutch
abilities.description: Sprouts eight arms to grab and clutch an opponent, typically to restrain or knock them unconscious

reveals.description: Blueno reveals that Robin survived the Buster Call at Ohara as the only survivor at age eight, and these traumatic memories drive her current actions
Her rejection of rescue is explained as fear of her friends suffering the same fate as Ohara if they continue to protect her

relationships.description: Attacks Sogeking to prevent him from rescuing her, showing her determination to sacrifice herself
Sogeking's words about Luffy visibly affect Robin, showing her internal conflict about leaving the crew

keyMoments.description: Ruthlessly kills Nero for only knowing four of the six Rokushiki powers, establishing CP9's brutal standards
Tells Sanji that Robin's entire existence is a curse and she was better off dead from birth

reveals.description: Reveals his belief that some people, including 8-year-old Robin, are better off dead, showing his absolutist view of justice
Demonstrates his superior Rokushiki skills by effortlessly catching Nero who was using Soru, then executing him with Shigan

keyMoments.description: Uses Doa Doa no Mi powers to pull back the escaped train car with Kalifa's whip
Demonstrates air door technique, appearing behind Sanji through a door created in mid-air
Warns about the Buster Call's destructive power
Reveals that the Buster Call destroyed Ohara, leaving Robin as the only survivor at age eight

reveals.description: Fully explains and demonstrates his Doa Doa no Mi ability to create doors on any surface, including in the air itself
Provides details about Robin's traumatic past and the Buster Call that destroyed Ohara

keyMoments.description: Enters CP9 car with Sanji after defeating previous opponents
Follows Sogeking's plan to detach the train cars
Sacrifices his own escape by knocking down the wall, creating an exit for others but trapping himself with CP9

reveals.description: Demonstrates selflessness and heroism by sacrificing his freedom to help Sogeking, Robin, and Sanji escape

keyMoments.description: Appears on the sea train tracks, blocking the Rocketman's path
Attacks and successfully knocks the Rocketman off its tracks

reveals.description: Demonstrates strength sufficient to derail an entire sea train, showing why he was a sparring partner for Sea Kings
